parameters.query: SELECT l.location_id, l.device_id, d.user_id, u.name as user_name, l.latitude, l.longitude, l.accuracy, l.timestamp FROM locations l JOIN devices d ON l.device_id = d.device_id JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.family_id = {{ $json.familyId }} AND l.timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '{{ $json.daysBack || 7 }} days' ORDER BY l.timestamp DESC LIMIT {{ $json.limit || 500 }}
